typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source, source1 lookup(source@Column_1 == source1@Column_1,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
